Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Declined\ out of all review-related activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of \SW-Reviewer Declined\ following \SW-AE Assign Reviewers\
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of manuscripts with \SW-Reviewer Declined\ that proceed to \SW-Awaiting EIC Decision\
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Declined\ followed by \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Frequency of \SW-Reviewer Declined\ in relation to total number of reviewer invitations sent
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Declined\ leading to \Assign a Different Editor\
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Number of \SW-Reviewer Declined\ before a manuscript is accepted (\RW-EIC Accept\)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'RW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Declined\ in manuscripts that undergo major revision (\SW-EIC Major Revision\)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Frequency of \SW-Reviewer Declined\ in manuscripts that are eventually rejected (\SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit\ and \SW-EIC Reject\)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': "activity == 'SW-Reviewer Declined'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit' || activity == 'SW-EIC Reject'"}

Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Declined\ in the first round of review versus subsequent rounds
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Number of \SW-Reviewer Declined\ occurrences before successful reviewer agreement (\SW-Reviewer Agreed\)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Declined\ for manuscripts that exceed the average review time
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of \SW-Reviewer Declined\ by month to identify peak periods of reviewer unavailability
Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Declined\ followed by a change in manuscript status to \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
